DOC.criteria: Ambulatory , good health medically stable Able understand comply plan study procedure Provide write informed consent Negative urine pregnancy test within 24 hour prior vaccination ( woman childbearing potential ) Prior serious severe reaction influenza vaccine Known contraindication either study vaccine Receipt influenza vaccine within 180 day prior enrollment Plan receive another licensed influenza vaccine duration study Receipt significant new diagnosis , medication ( licensed investigational ) , license vaccine within 30 day prior enrollment study Underlying disease therapeutic intervention might adversely affect immune response Plans participate investigation involve investigational product study .
